text: Brucker is a surname, and may refer to: * Ferdinand Brucker (1858–1904), American politician * Jane Brucker (born 1958), American actress * Johann Jakob Brucker (1696–1770), German historian of philosophy * Roger Brucker (born 1929), American cave explorer and author * Wilber M. Brucker (1894–1968), American politician ==See also== * Bruker * Brooker (disambiguation) * Bruckner (disambiguation)
title: Brucker
